00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"

00038 
00039 static const char* nonlinear_error 
00040  = "Attempt to use LinearTriangle mapping function for a nonlinear element\n";
00041 
00042 static inline void set_equal_derivatives( double value, 
00043                                           size_t* indices,
00044                                           MsqVector<3>* derivs,
00045                                           size_t& num_vtx )
00046 {
00047   num_vtx = 5;
00048   indices[0] = 0;
00049   indices[1] = 1;
00050   indices[2] = 2;
00051   indices[3] = 3;
00052   indices[4] = 4;
00053     
00054   derivs[0][0] = -value;
00055   derivs[0][1] = -value;
00056   derivs[0][2] = -0.25;
00057   
00058   derivs[1][0] =  value;
00059   derivs[1][1] = -value;
00060   derivs[1][2] = -0.25;
00061   
00062   derivs[2][0] =  value;
00063   derivs[2][1] =  value;
00064   derivs[2][2] = -0.25;
00065   
00066   derivs[3][0] = -value;
00067   derivs[3][1] =  value;
00068   derivs[3][2] = -0.25;
00069   
00070   derivs[4][0] =  0.0;
00071   derivs[4][1] =  0.0;
00072   derivs[4][2] =  1.0;
00073 }
00074 
00075 static inline void set_edge_derivatives( unsigned base_corner,
00076                                          double value,
00077                                          size_t* indices,
00078                                          MsqVector<3>* derivs,
00079                                          size_t& num_vtx )
00080 {
00081   const int direction = base_corner % 2;
00082   const int edge_beg =  base_corner;
00083   const int edge_end = (base_corner+1)%4;
00084   const int adj_end  = (base_corner+2)%4;
00085   const int adj_beg  = (base_corner+3)%4;
00086   const int dir_sign = 2*(edge_beg/2) - 1;
00087   const int oth_sign = 2*((edge_beg+1)/2%2) - 1;
00088 
00089   num_vtx = 5;
00090   indices[0] = edge_beg;
00091   indices[1] = edge_end;
00092   indices[2] = adj_end;
00093   indices[3] = adj_beg;
00094   indices[4] = 4;
00095 
00096   derivs[0][  direction] =  2 * dir_sign * value;
00097   derivs[0][1-direction] =      oth_sign * value;
00098   derivs[0][2] = -0.5;
00099 
00100   derivs[1][  direction] = -2 * dir_sign * value;
00101   derivs[1][1-direction] =      oth_sign * value;
00102   derivs[1][2] = -0.5;
00103 
00104   derivs[2][  direction] =  0.0;
00105   derivs[2][1-direction] = -oth_sign * value;
00106   derivs[2][2]           =  0.0;
00107 
00108   derivs[3][  direction] =  0.0;
00109   derivs[3][1-direction] = -oth_sign * value;
00110   derivs[3][2]           =  0.0;
00111 
00112   derivs[4][0] = 0.0;
00113   derivs[4][1] = 0.0;
00114   derivs[4][2] = 1.0;
00115 }
00116 
00117 static inline void set_corner_derivatives( unsigned corner,
00118                                            double value,
00119                                            size_t* indices,
00120                                            MsqVector<3>* derivs,
00121                                            size_t& num_vtx )
00122 {
00123   const unsigned adj_in_xi = (5 - corner) % 4;
00124   const unsigned adj_in_eta = 3 - corner;
00125 
00126   const int dxi_sign  = 2*((corner+1)/2%2)-1;
00127   const int deta_sign = 2*(corner/2) - 1;
00128   const double dxi_value = dxi_sign * value;
00129   const double deta_value = deta_sign * value;
00130 
00131   num_vtx = 4;
00132   indices[0] = corner;
00133   indices[1] = adj_in_xi;
00134   indices[2] = adj_in_eta;
00135   indices[3] = 4;
00136 
00137   derivs[0][0] =  dxi_value;
00138   derivs[0][1] =  deta_value;
00139   derivs[0][2] = -1.0;
00140 
00141   derivs[1][0] = -dxi_value;
00142   derivs[1][1] =  0.0;
00143   derivs[1][2] =  0.0;
00144 
00145   derivs[2][0] =  0.0;
00146   derivs[2][1] = -deta_value;
00147   derivs[2][2] =  0.0;
00148 
00149   derivs[3][0] =  0.0;
00150   derivs[3][1] =  0.0;
00151   derivs[3][2] =  1.0;
00152 }
00153 
00154 EntityTopology LinearPyramid::element_topology() const
00155   { return PYRAMID; }
00156   
00157 int LinearPyramid::num_nodes() const
00158   { return 5; }
00159 
00160 NodeSet LinearPyramid::sample_points( NodeSet ) const
00161 {
00162   NodeSet result;
00163   result.set_all_corner_nodes(PYRAMID);
00164   result.clear_corner_node(4);
00165   return result;
00166 }
00167 
00168 static void coefficients_at_corner( unsigned corner,
00169                                     double* coeff_out,
00170                                     size_t* indices_out,
00171                                     size_t& num_coeff )
00172 {
00173   num_coeff = 1;
00174   indices_out[0] = corner;
00175   coeff_out[0] = 1.0;
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00179 static void coefficients_at_mid_edge( unsigned edge,
00180                                       double* coeff_out,
00181                                       size_t* indices_out,
00182                                       size_t& num_coeff )
00183 {
00184   num_coeff = 2;
00185   coeff_out[0] = 0.5;
00186   coeff_out[1] = 0.5;
00187   
00188   if (edge < 4) {
00189     indices_out[0] = edge;
00190     indices_out[1] = (edge+1)%4;
00191   }
00192   else {
00193     indices_out[0] = edge-4;
00194     indices_out[1] = 4;
00195   }
00196 }
00197 
00198 static void coefficients_at_mid_face( unsigned face,
00199                                       double* coeff_out,
00200                                       size_t* indices_out,
00201                                       size_t& num_coeff )
00202 {
00203   if (face == 4) {
00204     num_coeff = 4;
00205     coeff_out[0] = 0.25;
00206     coeff_out[1] = 0.25;
00207     coeff_out[2] = 0.25;
00208     coeff_out[3] = 0.25;
00209     indices_out[0] = 0;
00210     indices_out[1] = 1;
00211     indices_out[2] = 2;
00212     indices_out[3] = 3;
00213   }
00214   else {
00215     num_coeff = 3;
00216     indices_out[0] = face;
00217     indices_out[1] = (face+1)%4;
00218     indices_out[2] = 4;
00219     coeff_out[0] = 0.25;
00220     coeff_out[1] = 0.25;
00221     coeff_out[2] = 0.50;
00222   }
00223 }
00224 
00225 static void coefficients_at_mid_elem( double* coeff_out,
00226                                       size_t* indices_out,
00227                                       size_t& num_coeff )
00228 {
00229   num_coeff = 5;
00230   coeff_out[0] = 0.125;
00231   coeff_out[1] = 0.125;
00232   coeff_out[2] = 0.125;
00233   coeff_out[3] = 0.125;
00234   coeff_out[4] = 0.500;
00235   indices_out[0] = 0;
00236   indices_out[1] = 1;
00237   indices_out[2] = 2;
00238   indices_out[3] = 3;
00239   indices_out[4] = 4;
00240 }
00241 
00242 void LinearPyramid::coefficients( Sample loc,
00243                                   NodeSet nodeset,
00244                                   double* coeff_out,
00245                                   size_t* indices_out,
00246                                   size_t& num_coeff,
00247                                   MsqError& err ) const
00248 {
00249   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00250     MSQ_SETERR(err)(nonlinear_error, MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00251     return;
00252   }
00253   
00254   switch (loc.dimension) {
00255     case 0:
00256       coefficients_at_corner( loc.number, coeff_out, indices_out, num_coeff );
00257       break;
00258     case 1:
00259       coefficients_at_mid_edge( loc.number, coeff_out, indices_out, num_coeff );
00260       break;
00261     case 2:
00262       coefficients_at_mid_face( loc.number, coeff_out, indices_out, num_coeff );
00263       break;
00264     case 3:
00265       coefficients_at_mid_elem( coeff_out, indices_out, num_coeff );
00266       break;
00267     default:
00268       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid/unsupported logical dimension",MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00269   }
00270 }
00271 
00272 void LinearPyramid::derivatives( Sample loc,
00273                                  NodeSet nodeset,
00274                                  size_t* vertex_indices_out,
00275                                  MsqVector<3>* d_coeff_d_xi_out,
00276                                  size_t& num_vtx,
00277                                  MsqError& err ) const
00278 {
00279   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00280     MSQ_SETERR(err)(nonlinear_error, MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00281     return;
00282   }
00283   
00284   switch (loc.dimension) {
00285     case 0:
00286       if (loc.number == 4) {
00287         set_equal_derivatives( 0.0, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00288       }
00289       else {
00290         set_corner_derivatives( loc.number, 1.0, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00291       }
00292       break;
00293     case 1:
00294       if (loc.number < 4) {
00295         set_edge_derivatives( loc.number, 0.50, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00296       }
00297       else {
00298         set_corner_derivatives( loc.number-4, 0.50, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00299       }    
00300       break;
00301     case 2:
00302       if (loc.number == 4) {
00303         set_equal_derivatives( 0.5, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00304       }
00305       else {
00306         set_edge_derivatives( loc.number, 0.25, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00307       }
00308       break;
00309     case 3:
00310       set_equal_derivatives( 0.25, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00311       break;
00312     default:
00313       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid/unsupported logical dimension",MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00314   }
00315 }
00316 
00317 void LinearPyramid::ideal( Sample location,
00318                            MsqMatrix<3,3>& J,
00319                            MsqError& err ) const
00320 {
00321   // For an ideal element with unit edge length at the base and unit
00322   // height, the Jacobian matrix is:
00323   // | 1-zeta    0      1/2 - xi  |
00324   // |  0       1-zeta  1/2 - eta |
00325   // |  0        0       1        |
00326   //
00327   // The coefficient to produce a unit determinant
00328   // is therefore (1-zeta)^(-2/3).  
00329   // 
00330   // Thus the unit-determinate ideal element Jacobian
00331   // is, given alpha = (1-zeta)^(-1/3):
00332   //
00333   // | 1/alpha  0      alpha^2 (1/2 - xi) |
00334   // | 0       1/alpha alpha^2 (1/2 - eta)|
00335   // | 0        0      alpha^2            |
00336   //
00337   // There are only three zeta values of interest:
00338   //  zeta = 1 : the degenerate case
00339   //  zeta = 0 : both 1/alpha and alpha^2 are 1.0
00340   //  zeta = 1/2 : 1/alpha = 1/cbrt(2.0) and alpha^2 = 2*(1/alpha)
00341   
00342     // special case for apex
00343   if (location.dimension == 0 && location.number == 4) {
00344     J = MsqMatrix<3,3>(0.0);
00345     return;
00346   }
00347     
00348     // These are always zero
00349   J(0,1) = J(1,0) = J(2,0) = J(2,1) = 0.0;
00350 
00351     // Set diagonal terms and magnitude of terms in 3rd column based on zeta
00352 
00353     // All of the zeta=0 locations
00354   double f;
00355   if ( location.dimension == 0 || 
00356       (location.dimension == 1 && location.number < 4) ||
00357       (location.dimension == 2 && location.number == 4)) {
00358       J(0,0) = J(1,1) = J(2,2) = 1.0;
00359       f = 0.5;
00360   }
00361     // all of the zeta=1/2 locations
00362   else {
00363     f = J(0,0) = J(1,1) = 0.79370052598409979;
00364     J(2,2) = 2.0*f;
00365   }
00366 
00367     // Set terms in 3rd column based on xi,eta
00368   
00369     // The xi = eta = 0.5 locations (mid-element in xi and eta)
00370   if ( location.dimension == 3 ||
00371       (location.dimension == 2 && location.number == 4)) {
00372         J(0,2) = J(1,2) = 0.0;
00373   }
00374     // The corner locations
00375   else if ( location.dimension == 0 ||  
00376            (location.dimension == 1 && location.number >= 4)) {
00377     switch (location.number % 4) {
00378       case 0: J(0,2) =  f; J(1,2) =  f; break;
00379       case 1: J(0,2) = -f; J(1,2) =  f; break;
00380       case 2: J(0,2) = -f; J(1,2) = -f; break;
00381       case 3: J(0,2) =  f; J(1,2) = -f; break;
00382     }
00383   }
00384     // The mid-edge locations
00385   else {
00386     switch (location.number) {
00387       case 0: J(0,2) =  0; J(1,2) =  f; break;
00388       case 1: J(0,2) = -f; J(1,2) =  0; break;
00389       case 2: J(0,2) =  0; J(1,2) = -f; break;
00390       case 3: J(0,2) =  f; J(1,2) =  0; break;
00391     }
00392   }  
00393 }
